text: Ã— (which is pronounced "multiply") is the second album by Ed Sheeran. It was first released in Australia and New Zealand on 20 June 2014, and then across the world three days later. The album was a major success, reaching number 1 in 15 countries, including the United States (Billboard 200) and the United Kingdom (UK Albums Chart). Five singles were released from the album: "Sing", "Don't", "Thinking Out Loud", "Bloodstream" (a collaboration with Rudimental), and "Photograph". ==References== Category:2014 albums Category:Ed Sheeran albums
title: X (Ed Sheeran album)
